design_philosophy.description: A fusion of traditional Honduran pulper√≠a aesthetics (hand-painted signs, vibrant fruits) with modern, clean app design. It avoids sterile tech minimalism in favor of warm, inviting textures and colors.

headings.usage: Main headers, section titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, buttons. Rounded nature feels friendly.

background.description: Warm Sand - Never pure white. A very light orange tint.

text.description: Dark Coffee/Earth tones instead of pure black.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 where p-4 is standard.

grid_system.bento: Use for categories: Mix square (1x1) and tall (1x2) tiles.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all active:scale-95 font-bold py-3 px-6
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-primary border-2 border-primary/20 hover:border-primary hover:bg-orange-50 font-bold py-3 px-6

cards.product: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md border border-orange-100 overflow-hidden transition-all duration-300 group
cards.store: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-md hover:shadow-lg border-b-4 border-primary transition-all

inputs.default: bg-white border-stone-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-xl py-3 px-4 text-stone-800 placeholder:text-stone-400

navigation.mobile_bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-lg border-t border-stone-100 py-3 px-6 flex justify-between items-center z-50 shadow-[0_-4px_20px_rgba(0,0,0,0.05)]

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure text on orange backgrounds is white or very dark brown. Avoid light grey text.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
3. THEME: Update tailwind.config.js with the specific colors defined above. Do not use default Tailwind colors.
4. COMPONENTS: When building the 'Store Card', use the 'store' card style defined above. It must have a border-bottom-width of 4px.
5. MAP: Use a placeholder div with a subtle pattern background for the map if the API is not connected, but style it to look like a map container (rounded corners, shadow).
6. CASH ONLY: Add a visible 'Solo Efectivo' (Cash Only) badge to the checkout and store profile pages.
7. MOBILE: Always design for mobile width first, then expand to desktop.
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all buttons and inputs (e.g., 'login-btn', 'search-input').
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not use default shadcn/ui styles without customization.
Ensure all images have alt text.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders.
